In 2019, “Skip the straw, save the turtles,” was the phrase circling the internet. This sparked my interest and became the topic that shaped my high school experience. Once I got to college, I found many environmental roles that I quickly became immersed in. Having explored many fields throughout my time as an undergraduate, I have decided to pursue a future in law in order to maximize my impact.
